Name: Imp repellent
Notes: Used in impling hunting and to make impling jars. Many types of flowers can be used to make it.

Name: Attack potion
Notes: Temporarily raises Attack level by 10% + 3.

Name: Antipoison
Notes: Cures poison and provides immunity for 90 seconds.

Name: Relicym's balm
Notes: Cures disease and provides immunity for a short time.

Name: Strength potion
Notes: Temporarily raises Strength level by 10% + 3.

Name: Serum 207
Notes: Temporarily cures Afflicted NPCs in Mort'ton

Name: Guthix rest tea
Notes: Cures poison, restores some run energy, and heals 5 Hitpoints (with the ability to overheal).

Name: Compost potion
Notes: Used to convert Compost into Supercompost.

Name: Restore potion
Notes: Restores combat-related stats back to normal by 30% of level plus 10.Does not restore Hitpoints or Prayer points.

Name: Guthix balance
Notes: Used against Vampyre Juvinates and Vampyre Juveniles, particularly in the Temple Trekking minigame.

Name: Blamish oil
Notes: Used to make oily fishing rods during the Heroes' Quest.

Name: Energy potion
Notes: Restores 10% run energy.

Name: Defence potion
Notes: Temporarily raises Defence level by 10% + 3.

Name: Agility potion
Notes: Temporarily raises Agility level by 3.

Name: Combat potion
Notes: Effect of both Attack potion and Strength potion.

Name: Prayer potion
Notes: Restores 25% of your total Prayer points plus 7. Effect increased by Holy wrench.

Name: Super attack
Notes: Temporarily increases Attack level by 15% plus 5.

Name: Superantipoison
Notes: Cures poison and provides immunity for 6 minutes.

Name: Fishing potion
Notes: Temporarily raises Fishing level by 3.

Name: Super energy
Notes: Restores 20% run energy.

Name: Shrink-me-quick
Notes: Reduces player size during the Grim Tales quest.

Name: Hunter potion
Notes: Temporarily raises Hunter level by 3.

Name: Super strength
Notes: Temporarily raises Strength level by 15% + 5.

Name: Magic essence
Notes: Temporarily raises Magic level by 3.

Name: Weapon poison
Notes: For use on arrows, daggers, spears, hastae, javelins, darts, knives, and bolts. Poison starts at 4 damage for melee weapons and 2 damage for ranged weapons.

Name: Super restore
Notes: Restores all stats (except hitpoints) by 25% + 8.

Name: Sanfew serum
Notes: Sanfew Serum combines the properties of super restore, superantipoison, and relicym's balm potions all in one.

Name: Super defence
Notes: Temporarily increases Defence level by 15% + 5.

Name: Antidote+
Notes: Cures and gives immunity to poison for 9 minutes.

Name: Antifire potion
Notes: Provides some resistance to dragon breath. Can be used with an anti-dragonfire shield to completely prevent dragonfire damage. Each dose lasts about 6 minutes.

Name: Divine super attack potion
Notes: Boosts the same as a super attack while lasting for 5 minutes with no state degradation.

Name: Divine super defence potion
Notes: Boosts the same as a super defence while lasting for 5 minutes with no state degradation.

Name: Divine super strength potion
Notes: Boosts the same as a super strength while lasting for 5 minutes with no state degradation.

Name: Ranging potion
Notes: Temporarily increases Ranged level by 10% + 4.

Name: Weapon poison+
Notes: For use on arrows, daggers, spears, hastae, javelins, darts, knives, and bolts. Poison starts at 5 damage for melee weapons and 3 damage for ranged weapons.

Name: Divine ranging potion
Notes: Boosts the same as a ranging potion while lasting for 5 minutes with no state degradation.

Name: Magic potion
Notes: Temporarily raises Magic level by 4.

Name: Stamina potion
Notes: Stamina potions restore 20% run energy and reduce the rate of energy depletion by 70% for 2 minutes.

Name: Zamorak brew
Notes: Boosts Strength by 12% + 2 and Attack by 20% + 2, but lowers Defence and remaining Hitpoints by 10% + 2.

Name: Divine magic potion
Notes: Boosts the same as a magic potion while lasting for 5 minutes with no state degradation.

Name: Antidote++
Notes: Cures poison and provides immunity for 12 minutes.

Name: Bastion potion
Notes: Temporarily increases Ranged by +10% + 4 and Defence by 15% + 5.

Name: Battlemage potion
Notes: Temporarily increases Magic by 4 and Defence by 15% + 5.

Name: Saradomin brew
Notes: Boosts Defence and Hitpoints but lowers Attack, Strength, Magic, and Ranged.

Name: Weapon poison++
Notes: For use on arrows, daggers, spears, hastae, javelins, darts, knives, and bolts.Poison starts at 6 damage for melee weapons and 4 damage for ranged weapons.

Name: Extended antifire
Notes: Provides some resistance to dragon breath. Each dose lasts about 12 minutes.

Name: Divine bastion potion
Notes: Boosts the same as a bastion potion while lasting for 5 minutes with no state degradation.

Name: Divine battlemage potion
Notes: Boosts the same as a battlemage potion while lasting for 5 minutes with no state degradation.

Name: Anti-venom
Notes: Instantly cures venom.

Name: Super combat potion
Notes: Combines the properties of super attack, super strength, and super defence potions.

Name: Super antifire potion
Notes: Grants complete immunity to dragonfire for three minutes.

Name: Anti-venom+
Notes: Instantly cures venom and provides immunity to it for three minutes.

Name: Divine super combat potion
Notes: Boosts the same as a super combat potion while lasting for 5 minutes with no state degradation.

Name: Extended super antifire
Notes: Grants complete immunity to dragonfire for six minutes.
